title: Bathroom 1
description: It was giving “I paid $49.99 for the night” when it should’ve been giving “I booked a luxury spa retreat.” Don’t worry — we gave this bathroom the glow-up it desperately needed.

title: Bathroom 2
description: TWO bathrooms. ONE house. FOUR days.

title: Bathroom 2 - Part 2
description: TWO bathrooms. ONE house. FOUR days.

title: Bathroom 3
description: From Struggle to Safety! This bathroom transformation is more than just a remodel — it’s a game-changer. Before, the tub was a daily challenge that made the homeowner feel unsafe and limited. Now, with a walk-in shower upgrade, he can stay comfortably and confidently in his own home for years to come. This is why I do what I do — helping people stay safe, independent, and happy right where they belong. Major transformation. Life-changing impact.

title: Bathroom 4
description: Goodbye tub, hello glow-up. Shower game = leveled all the way up! Tiles hittin’,glass gleamin’, and those bronze fixtures? Chef’s kiss. If your bathroom’s still stuck in 2005… we need to talk!

title: Bathroom 5
description: Scrub-a-dub-WHOA! We kicked the grime to the curb and gave this bathroom a serious glow-up.

title: Bathroom 6
description: From “eww” to “ooooh!” This bathroom glow-up went from horror film set to spa retreat! Old tub: 1 star (would not soak again)! New shower: 5 stars and a seat to match! No more mystery stains, just marble gains!

title: EV Install 1
description: Don’t let your EV run on empty! Public chargers got you waiting? Ain’t nobody got time for that! Get your home EV charger installed and juice up overnight like a boss.

title: Full Bathroom 1
description: This was NOT your average bathroom update… We went ALL IN — complete transformation in just 3 days! BEFORE: A cramped, outdated space that was falling apart. AFTER: A clean, safe, beautiful bathroom that feels like a spa. All this done in just 3 DAYS, no shortcuts, no BS. We do the work. We do it fast. We do it RIGHT.

title: Bathroom 7
description: From avocado tub TO spa club! This bathroom said goodbye to 1973 and hello to sleek, chic, and totally unique! No more mustard madness — now it’s glass, class, and a whole lotta sass!

title: Bathroom 8
description: Clean lines, fresh vibes Can’t stop staring at this shower makeover!

title: Bathroom 9
description: Bye-bye basic… Hello bold! This bathroom just got a major glow-up! Before: Tiny shower. Meh walls. After: Classy. Sleek. Marble magic.

title: Deck 1
description: Nothing like working on a sketchy deck 40’ in the air... This rebuild was much needed though!

title: Flooring 1
description: New bedroom flooring we put down for a repeat customer. We love repeat customers!

title: Flooring 2
description: Some beautiful tile work we did recently during a small renovation.

title: Flooring 3
description: Some beautiful tile work we did recently during a small renovation.

title: Water Heater 1
description: Upgraded this dinosaur water heater to a tankless heater. We also updated the closet to make it usable!
